description: I modernized the company's CRM software, which was previously updated over a year ago.
I took initiave to diagnose and resolve complex issues independently, seeking expert advice only when necessary.
I converted Javascript to Typescript to enhance code reliability and maintainability.
In my work I significantly improved CRM's performance and usability by cleaning up legace code and integrating advanced features using React.js, PHP, MySQL and Ag Grid.
Although primarily working independently, I effectively utilized the Scrum team's expertise to overcome challenging obstacles, demonstrating strong teamwork and communication skills.

work_experience.role: AML & Sanctions Processing Specialist and Team Lead Trainee
description: In my position I assumed primary responsibility for daily operational challenges, enabling the senior leader to concentrate on strategic planning and long-term objectives.
I managed day-to-day issues efficiently, ensuring seamless team operations.
My leadership style is personable and accessible which allowed my team to approach me easily and without hesitation.
I acted as a key communicator and 'translator' between IT and end-users, clarifying technical concepts and user requirements
to streamline software upgrades and process improvements. This role enhanced project outcomes and user satisfaction by ensuring that IT solutions met user needs effectively.
I worked with individuals and groups as a PT and physiotherapist.
My specialities are weightlifting, bodyweight training and preventive physiotherapy
I worked in the reception and managed the accounting offices invoicing.
I also did some accounting and account receivables for the customers.

education.name: Buutti Oy
description: Education part of the recruitment program. In the education part I had recap of the techniques such as
React Vite, Javascript, Typescript, Node, HTML, CSS, MySQL and testing with Jest. I also got to learn new skills such as Docker,
Azure (App Services with and without Docker and Database Services with PostgreSQL Server and Node application) and GitLab CI/CD

description: In the Code Academy I learned the basics of Fullstack Development.
The techniques mostly used were HTML, CSS, C#, Javascript, Typescript, React.js, Node.js and MySQL.
We also had a small introduction to Azure and AWS.
